title: Example 1 - Raw data from employee table
Example 1 - Query data mapping
description: In above image, the color green signifies that the output for our query will include all rows and columns being selected.

title: Example 2:
description: Let's understand the process of extracting desired columns from a specified table. In this case, we aim to retrieve 4 columns from the employee table.

title: Example 2 - Raw data from employee table
Example 2 - Query
code:
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email
 FROM employee;

title: Example 2 - Query data mapping
description: In above image, the color green signifies that the output for our query will include data from desired columns(employee_id, first_name, last_name and email).
